mapper.sql: select s.STUDENT_ID studentId,s.STUDENT_NO studentNo,s.NAME studentName,r.RESULT_ID resultId, r.SCORE,e.EXAM_ID examId,e.NAME examName,sub.NAME subjectName from t_student s left join t_exam_result r on s.STUDENT_ID=r.STUDENT_ID left join t_exam e on r.EXAM_ID=e.EXAM_ID left join t_subject sub on r.SUBJECT_ID=sub.SUBJECT_ID
mapper.select: where s.class_id=#{1} and e.EXAM_ID=#{0} and r.subject_id=#{2}
select distinct subject_id from t_exam_result where exam_id = #{0}
where s.student_id=#{1} and e.EXAM_ID=#{0} and r.subject_id=#{2}
select t.EXAM_ID as examId,t.STUDENT_ID as studentId,SUM(t.SCORE) as totalScore from t_exam_result t WHERE t.EXAM_ID = #{0} group by t.EXAM_ID,t.STUDENT_ID ;
